Title: Useful Idiot
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Debora Cahn, Anya Leta (staff writer)

Plot: Carrie has problems at home. Saul and Wellington work on Paley.
